scripts.build:test: rm -rf dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=testing PREVENT_MOCK=1 webpack --progress --colors --config build/webpack.test.conf.js
scripts.build:test:uglify: rm -rf dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=testing UGLIFY=1 PREVENT_MOCK=1 webpack --progress --colors --config build/webpack.test.conf.js
scripts.build:dev:m: rm -rf mobiledist && cross-env MOBILE=1 webpack --progress --colors --config build/webpack.dist.dev.conf.js
scripts.build:dev:m:uglify: rm -rf mobiledist && cross-env UGLIFY=1 MOBILE=1 webpack --progress --colors --config build/webpack.dist.dev.conf.js
scripts.build:test:m: rm -rf mobiledist && cross-env NODE_ENV=testing MOBILE=1 webpack --progress --colors --config build/webpack.test.conf.js
scripts.build:test:m:uglify: rm -rf mobiledist && cross-env UGLIFY=1 NODE_ENV=testing MOBILE=1 webpack --progress --colors --config build/webpack.test.conf.js
scripts.build:dev:cc: rm -rf ccdist && cross-env UGLIFY=1 CC=1 webpack --progress --colors --config build/webpack.dist.dev.conf.js
scripts.build:dev:boss: rm -rf bossdist && cross-env FOR_BOSS=1 webpack --progress --colors --config build/webpack.dist.dev.conf.js
scripts.build:test:cc: rm -rf ccdist && cross-env CC=1 NODE_ENV=testing PREVENT_MOCK=1 webpack --progress --colors --config build/webpack.test.conf.js
scripts.build:test:cc:uglify: rm -rf ccdist && cross-env UGLIFY=1 CC=1 NODE_ENV=testing PREVENT_MOCK=1 webpack --progress --colors --config build/webpack.test.conf.js
scripts.dev:test:bx:8086: cross-env PORT=8086 PREVENT_MOCK=1 APP_ENV=testing BX=1 node --max_old_space_size=8000 build/dev-server.js
scripts.dev:test:8087: cross-env APP_ENV=testing PORT=8087 PREVENT_MOCK=1 node --max_old_space_size=5000 build/dev-server.js
scripts.dev:test:cc: cross-env APP_ENV=testing PORT=8086 CC=1 node --max_old_space_size=4096 build/dev-server.js
scripts.dev:static:restart: forever stop build/static-server.js && npm run dev:static
scripts.dev:static:sb: cross-env BX=1 SB=1 forever -s start build/static-server.js
scripts.dev:static:sb:restart: forever stop build/static-server.js && npm run dev:static:sb
scripts.dev:test:m:9000: cross-env APP_ENV=testing PORT=9000 MOBILE=1 node build/dev-server.js
scripts.dev:remote: cross-env USE_BABEL=1 REMOTE=1 BX=1 node --max_old_space_size=6144 build/dev-server.js
scripts.build:prod: rm -rf dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --progress --colors --config build/webpack.prod.conf.js
scripts.build:dev:zip: rm -rf dist && webpack --progress --colors --config build/webpack.dist.dev.conf.js && jszip -c jszip.json
scripts.build:dev:sb: rm -rf dist && cross-env BX=1 SB=1 webpack --progress --colors --config build/webpack.dist.dev.conf.js
